thread.title: NEA Urges Teachers, Students to Protest Trump at Schools
thread.title_full: NEA Urges Teachers, Students to Protest Trump at Schools

author: Fox News Insider
title: NEA Urges Teachers, Students to Protest Trump at Schools
text:
4 P 
It's live coverage from D.C. of Trump’s final moments as president-elect! First, Your World has a can’t-miss inauguration preview. Then, The Five co-hosts discuss all the last-minute prep. 6 P 
Get ready for the inauguration with the best political team out there. First, Bret Baier has smart analysis on Special Report . Then at 7:00 p.m. ET, Martha MacCallum talks to incoming Press Secretary Sean Spicer on The First 100 Days . 8 
What should Trump say in his inaugural address? The O'Reilly Factor has the inside story. 9 P 
Tucker Carlson Tonight has a must-see preview of the inauguration ceremony and speech. Then at 10, Hannity gets insight on what America can expect from the new administration. The First 100 Days Organization Urges Teachers, Students to Skip School & Protest Trump Jan 19, 2017 7:50pm The National Education Association urged students and teachers to skip school today to protest President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration. Outrageous Michigan 4th Grade Teacher Won't Let Students Watch Trump Inauguration Speech Jan 18, 2017 7:59pm A teacher in Michigan reportedly will not allow his fourth-grade students to watch President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration speech on Friday. Dyson: No Denying A Lot of Anti-Obama Sentiment Was 'Racially Driven' Jan 17, 2017 8:28pm Author and professor Michael Eric Dyson told Martha MacCallum on "The First 100 Days" that stereotyping have harmed the ability to have a difference of opinion on President Obama.
